featured.name: Password Strength Analyzer
featured.description: A defensive password strength checker built with Flask. Evaluates passwords using entropy analysis, pattern detection, and breach-list lookups without storing or logging passwords.
skills: Implemented zxcvbn entropy scoring and pattern detection
Integrated Have I Been Pwned API with k-anonymity for breach checks
Applied rate limiting (10 req/min) and security headers (CSP, X-Frame-Options)
Built secure JSON API that never logs or stores passwords

featured.name: Phishing URL Detector
featured.description: A defensive web application that analyzes URLs for phishing indicators using static URL analysis and threat intelligence feeds (PhishTank, URLhaus). Returns risk scores with explainable results.
skills: Built URL structure analysis detecting IP hosts, punycode, and suspicious TLDs
Integrated PhishTank and URLhaus threat intelligence feeds
Implemented risk scoring (0-100) with human-readable explanations
Applied SSRF prevention by analyzing URL strings only, never fetching content

featured.name: Secret-Key Encryption Lab
featured.description: Cryptography lab from CISC 447/866 demonstrating AES encryption modes, padding schemes, IV vulnerabilities, and a key finder program using OpenSSL.
skills: Explored AES-CBC, ECB, and CTR encryption modes
Analyzed padding oracle and IV reuse vulnerabilities
Built shell scripts to automate encryption/decryption tasks
Implemented brute-force key finder for weak key spaces

featured.name: Attack Lab (Buffer Overflow)
featured.description: Binary exploitation lab practicing buffer overflow attacks, code injection, and return-oriented programming (ROP) on vulnerable executables.
skills: Exploited stack buffer overflows to hijack control flow
Crafted shellcode payloads for code injection attacks
Practiced return-oriented programming (ROP) techniques
Analyzed x86-64 assembly and memory layout

other.name: Library Management System (QA)
other.description: Flask web application for library management with comprehensive test suite, CI/CD pipeline, and Docker containerization.
skills: Wrote pytest test suites with coverage reporting
Configured GitHub Actions for automated testing
Containerized application with Docker

other.name: Library System (Flask + SQLite)
other.description: Flask-based library management system with SQLite database, modular blueprints, and comprehensive requirements specification.
skills: Implemented Flask blueprints for modular routing
Designed SQLite database schema
Built REST API endpoints for library operations

other.name: Siege of Morrofeld (Tower Defense)
other.description: Tower defense game built in C++ demonstrating object-oriented design, game loop architecture, and systems programming.
skills: Implemented game loop and state management in C++
Applied object-oriented design patterns
Managed memory and system resources
